aiInstructions.PURPOSE: This file is for AI-created token extensions. New component variants, experimental tokens, and customizations go here.

$metadata.reason: User requested more compact button for dense UIs

tokenUsage.WHY: Skipping layers breaks the chain. Updates to semantic tokens won't flow through if you reference foundation directly.
tokenUsage.CRITICAL_RULE: Always use semantic tokens wherever possible. Use foundation tokens only if no relevant semantic tokens exist. Only hard-code values where no semantic OR foundation tokens can be applied.
referenceOrder: 2. Foundation tokens ({core.foundation.*}) - fallback if no semantic exists

creatingTokens.CHANGELOG: Add an entry to changelog.entries for every change
STATUS_VALUES: approved - Ready for promotion to core
creatingTokens.REFERENCE_FORMAT: Always use {core.*} prefix when referencing tokens from tokens-core.json (e.g., {core.semantic.typography.label.sm})
creatingTokens.METADATA_REQUIRED: Every new token must include $metadata with: createdBy, createdAt, status, reason

CAN_EDIT: tokens-extended.json - This file. Add new tokens here.
DO_NOT_EDIT: tokens-core.json - Read-only, managed by DesignPush app
variables.css - Generated output, will be overwritten
